          Render the content using our convention based approach If the content has a template, it is passed to the template for rendering as the "node" variable in the model If the content has no template, if it has a content property it will be rendered verbatim to the client

      • Field Detail

        • private java.lang.Object renderPipeline

          Do the full default render pipeline on the supplied content instance. NOTE: Only this exact instance will be rendered, `so it must be pre-resolved if it is a WcmVirtualContent node

          todo:
          Should we move this to ContentRepo service? Still requires a delegate that has all controller-style methods but could be reusable in a non-request context e.g. jobs that produce PDFs or sending HTML emails from CMS

        • UserInfo makeUserInfo()

        • java.lang.Object renderContent(java.lang.Object controllerDelegate, WcmContent content)

          Render the content using our convention based approach If the content has a template, it is passed to the template for rendering as the "node" variable in the model If the content has no template, if it has a content property it will be rendered verbatim to the client

        • java.lang.Object renderFile(java.lang.Object controllerDelegate, java.io.File f, java.lang.String mimeType)

          Render a file

        • java.lang.Object renderFileDB(java.lang.Object controllerDelegate, byte[] rawContent, java.lang.String mimeType)

          Renders a "file" stored in the database.

        • void renderGSPContent(java.lang.Object request, java.lang.Object response, WcmContent content, java.lang.Object model = null)

          Render a content node with support for GSP tags and template Works in one of two ways: 1. If content node is a template, evaluates the template and passes in model, presumed to contain "node" for for content 2. If content node is not a template, evaluats the content as a GSP, then passes it as pre-rendered body content to the template of "content" if there is one.

        • void renderGSPContent(java.lang.Object controllerDelegate, WcmContent content, java.lang.Object model = null)

          Render a content node with support for GSP tags and template

          See Also:
          static

        • void showContent(java.lang.Object controllerDelegate, java.lang.Object content)
